page.title: 18Media in the Uzmaston area
page.content: National and local{newspapers}(not magazines) are delivered from town as far as Clover Park (21 p. per week). Other residents depend on neighbouring car owners to collect and deliver. {Local newspapers}have a wide weekly circulation (Western Telegraph 26,000) There is a choice of 7 local papers, English and Welsh (16-24p. each), 11 {National newspapers}(18-35p.), 112 {Weekly magazines}(14-35p.), 256 {Monthly magazines}(55p-Â£1) and 8 {Quarterlys. }25,000 free copies of the {Pembrokeshire Advertiser}are delivered monthly. {Haverfordwest {Library}has reference books, papers, magazines and a photocopier for use at the library, and a lending service for books, records, cassettes and the WRVS will deliver to the housebound. {Televisions and Videos}are owned or rented by most families.
